attributes.action: enforce reduced costs of mobile internet access through GPRS/EDGE and 3G mobile networks
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The current prices paid by users to mobile phone operators for mobile internet access is extortionate. Operators worldwide provide cheaper GPRS access to their customers than those in the UK, and the prices paid in the UK for the service are unfair and unacceptable. Operators should not be allowed to charge anywhere near this amount for the service.
